channel.title: Jedr's Blog
channel.description: Blog by Jedr Blaszyk. Bikepacking, photography & tech.

item.title: Bikepacking in France - Provence and Hautes-Alpes
item.description: Bikepacking adventure in southern France. Exploring the beauty of Provence in Verdon Natural Regional Park and conquering mountain passes of the Hautes-Alpes.
item.content:encoded: (This is an article posted to my blog. You can read it online by clicking here.)

item.title: Gravmageddon 2023: Karkonosze - Izery Gravel Race
item.description: The mountains are calling and I must go... 360km of racing with 7,600m of elevation gain. Recap of the race and my bike setup.
item.content:encoded: (This is an article posted to my blog. You can read it online by clicking here.)

item.title: Tuscany Trail: Bikepacking in Italy
item.description: Wine, espresso and the Giro d'Italia. A bikepacking adventure along the Strade Bianche, which led us through old Renaissance towns in Tuscany.
item.content:encoded: (This is an article posted to my blog. You can read it online by clicking here.)

item.title: Norway Bikepacking: Trondheim to Bergen
item.description: Cycling from Trondheim to Bergen in 10 days. 1000km and 14,000m of elevation gain. Fjords, ferries and glaciers.
item.content:encoded: (This is an article posted to my blog. You can read it online by clicking here.)

item.title: Iceland 4x4 Roadtrip
item.description: Unique landscapes, smouldering volcanoes and blue glaciers complemented by Reykjavik coffee culture.
item.content:encoded: (This is an article posted to my blog. You can read it online by clicking here.)

item.title: Fly-in hike around Isle of Wight
item.description: We flew to the Isle of Wight from London with camping gear on board. Then, we hiked for 3 days to the Needles.
item.content:encoded: (This is an article posted to my blog. You can read it online by clicking here.)

item.title: Kattegat Loop Bikepacking - Denmark and Sweden
item.description: Bikepacking, wild camping trip around the Kattegat in Denmark and Sweden. Cycling through MalmÃ¶, Gothenburg, Aarhus and Copenhagen.

item.title: Bikepacking & wild camping in Sweden
item.description: Baltic Sea, lakes and forests - 8 days of bikepacking and wild camping adventure.

item.title: Road cycling in London
item.description: Looking for a great cycling route to escape the city with? Here are my personal favourites to get some miles in during the coronavirus lockdown.

item.title: Sussex Coastal Marathon
item.description: My first marathon. Hilly, muddy and windy race, definitely worth it.
